contexts.context: (Budapest). Merchants and sales <mark>clerks</mark> are in dispute on the matter of the Sunday...
...should be reduced in severity, but the sales <mark>clerks</mark> wish for the stores to be closed all Sunday...
...for her conversion. Her lover was a lesser <mark>clerk</mark> who promised to make her luckiest girl in the...
...Krakow, already baptised and already married to the <mark>clerk</mark>. The parents became sick caused by shame and...
...the princely hall. The door opened, the <mark>clerk</mark> came in and Kempe quickly vanished.
